appetizers.name: cheesey bread
appetizers.description: pizza dough stuffed with cheese and topped with a mix of pizza cheese and chedder cheese cut into 8 pieces and served with your choice of dipping suace.

appetizers.name: Garlic Parmasan Bread Bites
appetizers.description: 6 Portabella Mushrooms stuffed and baked with an assortment of seafood. Served with lemons

appetizers.name: Wings
appetizers.description: Your choice of bone in or boneless chicken. and a pick from BBQ, Hot or Mild Sauce. with a side of a dipping sauce of your choice.

cold sandwiches.name: Cuban
cold sandwiches.description: A classic Cuban Sub sandwich with and assortment of Cuban meats

cold sandwiches.name: Classic Italian Sub
cold sandwiches.description: A classic Italian Sub with an assortment of Italian meats

hot sandwiches.name: Meatball Sub
hot sandwiches.description: A savory, toasted meatball and marinara sub

hot sandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak
hot sandwiches.description: The favorite Philly Cheesesteak on chibotta bread witha buttered outside, shredded philly meat on the inside cheese on top and bottom melted to perfrection, stuffed with greenpeppers,onions, and mushrooms and baked.

desserts.name: cheesecake
desserts.description: Crushed graham cracker with thick layer of creamcheese, eggs, and sugar

desserts.name: cinnoman twist
desserts.description: Warm baked buttery dough baked in a twist and covered with a cinnamon sugar topping and served with a side of icing to dip the twist in.
